title: GZDL Bluetooth Smart Watch DZ09 Smartwatch Watch Phone Support SIM TF Card with Camera for Android IOS iPhone Samsung LG Phones Black
feature: High Sensitive Capacitive Touch Screen;Perfect Match Technology,1.54" TFT HD LCD; Resolution Ratio: 240x240 Pixel
Phone Function: Can Be As A Standalone Mobile Phone To Make Phone Calls Including Answering And Dial-Up. Supports Single SIM Card (Micro SIM Card), 2G GSM/GPRS 850/900/1800/1900
Sync Function: Whatsapp,Twitter,Facebook,Browser(Require SIM Card Which Is Available For Internet); Schedule,Read Text Message;Pedometer,Sedentary Remind
Other Functions: Image Viewer, Sound Recorder ( A SD Card Is Required ), Audio Player, Remote Capture, Alarm Clock, Calendar, Calculator, Camera,Two-Way Anti-Lost

Two Working Mode:One Is Company Mode(Bluetooth), It Enable To Make Call Or Receive Call, Send Or Get Message Etc Via Bluetooth. The Other Funchion Is Network Mode( With Sim Card Inserted). It Enable To Make And Answer Calls,Send Or Get Message Via The SIM Card Which Means The Watch Works As A Standalone Cellphone
description: 1. The Watch Works With Android 4.3 Or Higher, IOS 7.0 Or Higher. 2. For Android Phone It Supports All Functions. Scanning the QuickResp Code On Watch Menu to Download The APP "Funrun". Or Search the APP From Google Store. 3. Because Of No APP Available For iPhone, So Five Functions Can't Be Used (Anti-lost,Messaging,Notifier,Remote Camera,Bluetooth music). Other Functions Can Be Used Normally Because No need The APP. 4. The Package Does Not Contain SIM Card Or SD Card 5. The Watch Is Only Daily Water Resistant, Not For Showering Or Swimming. 6. There's No Built-in Memory In This Watch So It Needs The SD Card To Save Pictures And Music. Internet: 2G GSM/GPRS 850/900/1800/1900 SIM Card Bluetooth Version: 4.0 Camera: 0.3M Display: 1.54" TFT LCD Touch Screen Picture Format: JPEG, GIF, BMP, PNG Music Format: MP3 Clock Display: 3 Styles External Storage: Support Max 32GB TF Card(Not Included) Watch Surface Size: 3.6cm*5.5cm Thickness: 1.3cm The Adjustable Length of Strap: 14.7cm-19cm Net Weight: 52.5g Camera, Remote Camera, Phone Book, Calls Records, Pedometer, Sleep Monitor, Sedentary Remind, Alarm, Calendar, Calculator, Image Viewer, Sounder Recorder Message: Local SMS; Phone Message Bluethooth Synchronization Anti lost: Watch Seek Phone, Or Phone Seek Watch Remote Notifier:Ring And Vibration Audio Player: Play Local Music Or From Smart Phone Connected Via Bluetooth. Facebook, Twitter, WhatsApp, Browser: Require SIM Card Which Is Available For Internet. SIM Tool: The Watch Could Be A Standalone Phone With SIM Card Inserted(Not Included). 1 X Smart Watch 1 X USB Cable 1 X User Manual
